member.name: M:syncfusion.treeviewdemos.wpf.MusicInfoViewModel.CanExecuteOnDemandLoading(System.Object)
member.summary: CanExecute method is called before expanding and initialization of node. Returns whether the node has child nodes or not. Based on return value, expander visibility of the node is handled.
member.param: TreeViewNode is passed as default parameter
member.returns: Returns true, if the specified node has child items to load on demand and expander icon is displayed for that node, else returns false and icon is not displayed.

member.name: M:syncfusion.treeviewdemos.wpf.MusicInfoViewModel.ExecuteOnDemandLoading(System.Object)
member.summary: Execute method is called when any item is requested for load-on-demand items.
member.param: TreeViewNode is passed as default parameter
